summary: This code copies the "novnc_service.service" file to the systemd directory, reloads the daemon, stops and starts the "novnc_service", and enables it for automatic startup on Linux systemd-based systems.

details.comment: This code copies the "novnc_service.service" file to the systemd directory, reloads the daemon, stops and starts the "novnc_service", and enables it for automatic startup on Linux systemd-based systems.
details.content:
# ought to be rendered as bash scripts.
sudo cp novnc_service.service /etc/systemd/system/novnc_service.service
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl kill novnc_service
sudo systemctl start novnc_service
sudo systemctl enable novnc_service
